Patrick Ewing

Pronunciation: \YOO-wing\

Patrick Aloysius Ewing Sr.

(Big Pat, Hoya Destroya, Pat, The Big Fella, Beast)

Position: Center and Power Forward ▪ Shoots: Right

7-0, 240lb (213cm, 108kg)

Born: August 5, 1962 in Kingston, Jamaica jm

Relatives: Son Patrick Ewing

College: Georgetown

High School: Cambridge Rindge & Latin in Cambridge, Massachusetts

Draft: New York Knicks, 1st round (1st pick, 1st overall), 1985 NBA Draft

NBA Debut: October 26, 1985

Hall of Fame: Inducted as Player in 2008 (Full List)

Career Length: 17 years

Frequently Asked Questions

How old is Patrick Ewing?

Patrick Ewing is 61 years old.

Where was Patrick Ewing born?

Patrick Ewing was born in Kingston, Jamaica.

When was Patrick Ewing born?

Patrick Ewing was born on August 5, 1962.

How tall is Patrick Ewing?

Patrick Ewing is 7-0 (213 cm) tall.

How much did Patrick Ewing weigh when playing?

Patrick Ewing weighed 240 lbs (108 kg) when playing.

Is Patrick Ewing in the Hall of Fame?

Patrick Ewing was inducted to the Hall of Fame as a Player in 2008 (Full List) .

When was Patrick Ewing drafted?

Patrick Ewing was drafted by New York Knicks, 1st round (1st pick, 1st overall), 1985 NBA Draft.

What position did Patrick Ewing play?

Center and Power Forward.

When did Patrick Ewing retire?

Patrick Ewing last played in 2002.

What is Patrick Ewing's net worth?

Patrick Ewing made at least $125,193,120 playing professional basketball.

How much did Patrick Ewing make?

Patrick Ewing made $20,500,000 in 1998.

What did Patrick Ewing average?

Patrick Ewing averaged 21.0 points, 9.8 rebounds, and 1.9 assists per game.

How many rings does Patrick Ewing have?

Patrick Ewing won 0 championships.

What schools did Patrick Ewing attend?

Patrick Ewing attended Cambridge Rindge & Latin in Cambridge, Massachusetts and Georgetown.

What are Patrick Ewing's nicknames?

Big Pat, Hoya Destroya, Pat, The Big Fella, Beast are nicknames for Patrick Ewing.
